title: Site Reliability Engineer - Apple Maps Infrastructure Team
summary: The Apple Maps Infrastructure team is seeking an outstanding engineer to help build capabilities and services across various technologies in a hybrid cloud environment...
description: We are seeking a Senior Engineer with expertise in reliability, scalability, resilience, security, optimization, and service performance of critical infrastructure services. In this role, you will collaborate with engineering, security, and SRE teams to guarantee the secure and efficient operation of services. Additionally, you will drive optimization opportunities in a hybrid cloud environment.
preferred_qualifications:
Knowledge in or interest to work on:
- Configuration management tools like Chef, Puppet or Ansible
- Experience with core infrastructure services like LDAP, DNS, Puppet, Repo, etc.,
- A strong sense of ownership...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200...
